divs: Sighting DetailsMy dog wanted out so i left him out, so i decided to go out i saw an object just to my north, it was too low to be a planet and was so bright it hurt your eyes to look at it, i watched it fall, go right go left and go back up, no normal aircraft can do what it done, i ran in and got my wife and kids, it began noving to the north, it began dimming then getting brighter, it done this several times before turning orange, then it would get bright orange fade, blink out then come back on , we watched it until it vanished.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Corsica
This sighting has never been favorited.
